overview: A terror thriller! Mike steals the new girl Nikki from Frank Barnes, a famous actor on Walker Cain's set. Much to everyone's surprise Frank offers Travis, Gina, Mike and Nikki his family's cabin for a weekend vacation. Everyone is excited and takes his offer! But as soon as they arrive, they get an uneasy feeling from the townsfolk. No one knew that this weekend getaway would be their last.
title: Devil's Snare
